dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: GOD IS A LABORING PARENT / HUMANITY IS A GLOBAL FAMILY

kernfrasen: aus der Einsicht in unsere Schuld kommen
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: REPENTANCE IS A CHANGE OF DIRECTION
SINFUL STRUCTURES ARE A WAR MACHINE

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: Evangelium zusammengefaltet wie das Kleid einer Prinzessin in einer Nussschale

cognitieve_implicaties: The gospel is beautiful but compact
Faith must be 'worn' to be understood
theologische_implicaties: Theology is not abstract theory but lived practice
ethische_implicaties: One must act out the gospel to see if it 'fits'
onbedoelde_consequenties: Gospel might be seen as a luxury item (Princess dress)

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: A highly creative, non-conventional opening that disrupts the schema of 'dry' scripture.

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: Gottes Hände ... schmieden vor unseren Augen aus Schwertern Pflugscharen

cognitieve_implicaties: God is active and physical, not distant
theologische_implicaties: Synergism: God works through human hands
ethische_implicaties: Pacifism and social justice are the 'work' of God
onbedoelde_consequenties: Risk of Pelagianism (God only has the hands we give Him)

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: Revitalizes the dead metaphor of 'God's hands' by adding specific labor (smithing, planting).

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The sermon centers on the tension between the 'Todesmaschine' (Death Machine) and 'Gottes Hände' (God's Hands). All metaphors serve this binary.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: Time is 'poured' from the hands of the machine into the hands of God.

sterktes.beschrijving: Re-activates the 'God's hands' metaphor by contrasting it with the 'hands of the chemical industry'.
sterktes.voorbeeld: Gott hat viele Hände... sie geben den Hungrigen Brot.

risicos.beschrijving: By defining the 'Devil' as a man in a suit, it might externalize evil too much.
risicos.voorbeeld: Teufel, der heutzutage im eleganten Zweireiher herumläuft
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregation might miss their own complicity in the 'machine'.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: A world divided between a cold, industrial 'Death Machine' and a warm, laboring 'Kingdom of God'.
sub_worlds: The prison cell (John the Baptist/El Salvador)

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: Focus on hands and labor rather than eyes or plans.

verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Critique of the 'Beruhigungspille' (tranquilizer) view of providence.
verstoorde_schemas.vervangend_schema: God as the one whose hands are active in justice.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Strongly aligns with the 'Kirchentag' context of 1989.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by the 'HANDS' and 'MACHINE' domains. It successfully moves from abstract time (Chronos) to embodied action (Kairos). The theological landscape is one of resistance and active participation.

revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: The Kingdom is a bank account closed in protest.

coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Connect the beauty of the gospel (dress) to the dignity of work (hands).

entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: If God only has our hands, is He powerless without us?
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Briefly mention God's 'hands' in creation/resurrection to ground His sovereignty.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using CMT to turn a 'dead' theological slogan into a living call for justice.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: CMT shows how the 'Nussschale' isn't just a pretty image but a cognitive frame for 'containment' and 'essence'.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Unlike Kolb's focus on the 'four-fold' experience, CMT highlights the underlying conceptual mappings (TIME IS A PRISON).
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: Reveals the 'Todesmaschine' as a powerful counter-metaphor to the 'Body of Christ'.

appendices.notities: Sölle uses 'Hände' as a metonymy for agency.
